definition: to return home (after a lifetime's absence)/to go back to one's roots
surname Gui

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
in the final analysis/ultimately
after all/in the final analysis/ultimately
Getting Home, 2007 PRC comedy-drama film directed by 張揚|张扬[Zhang1 Yang2], starring 趙本山|赵本山[Zhao4 Ben3 shan1]
lit. a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom)/fig. all things go back to their source eventually/in old age, an expatriate returns home
Getting Home, 2007 PRC comedy-drama film directed by 張揚|张扬[Zhang1 Yang2], starring 趙本山|赵本山[Zhao4 Ben3 shan1]
lit. a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom)/fig. all things go back to their source eventually/in old age, an expatriate returns home
a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom); everything has its ancestral home/In old age, an expatriate longs to return home.
ultimately/in the final analysis/after all/when all is said and done
see 樹高千丈，葉落歸根|树高千丈，叶落归根[shu4 gao1 qian1 zhang4 , ye4 luo4 gui1 gen1]
pinyin: shu4 gao1 qian1 zhang4 , luo4 ye4 gui1 gen1

definition: fig. a tree may grow a thousand zhang high, but its leaves return to their roots (proverb)/fig. everything has its ancestral home/in old age, an expatriate returns home
pinyin: shu4 gao1 qian1 zhang4 , ye4 luo4 gui1 gen1

definition: variant of 歸根結底|归根结底[gui1 gen1 jie2 di3]

sentences.english: I am a European, and one returns to one's roots .
sentences.chinese: 我是個歐洲人，總要葉落歸根。

sentences.english: Ultimately, sequence diagrams are maps of interaction.
sentences.chinese: 歸根結底，序列圖就是交互圖。

sentences.english: Bottomline is that China story is over.
sentences.chinese: 歸根結底是，中國故事已經結束了。

sentences.english: The competition among enterprises is the competing for the excellent employees in the finial analysis.
sentences.chinese: 企業競爭歸根到底是人才的競爭。

sentences.english: The reason behind this is that it makes the products seem to have higher protein levels.
sentences.chinese: 歸根究底是因爲它能使產品看上去蘊含豐富的蛋白質。

sentences.english: So perhaps guilt is good after all.
sentences.chinese: 歸根到底，也許罪惡感是個好東西。

sentences.english: After all, journalism is all about being in the right place at the right -- or wrong -- time.
sentences.chinese: 歸根到底新聞就是要在恰當的時間出現在恰當的地方。

sentences.english: THE conventional wisdom about southern politics is that it all comes down to race.
sentences.chinese: 根據一般常識，南部地區政治歸根結底與種族有關。

sentences.english: The more liquid a market, after all, the more smoothly it should function.
sentences.chinese: 歸根結底，市場流動性越好，其運行也就應該越順暢。

sentences.english: What it boils down to is a more skillful way of dealing with people.
sentences.chinese: 歸根結柢，是一個更巧妙的方法來處理人。

sentences.english: But that's, after all, what we've just described, in imagining the cycling with the memory loss.
sentences.chinese: 歸根結底，那正是我們對，想象中的循環失憶的描述。

sentences.english: In the final analysis, most of life's joys are transitory.
sentences.chinese: 歸根結底，塵世間的歡樂大多是過眼煙雲，轉瞬即逝。

sentences.english: And that, in the end, is why we need open source.
sentences.chinese: 而歸根結底，這就是我們需要開源的理由。

sentences.english: But in the end, there are no excuses.
sentences.chinese: 但歸根結底，是沒有任何藉口的。

sentences.english: In the final analysis, then, Liu Xie's philosophy of literature is a philosophy of humanity.
sentences.chinese: 因此，歸根到底，劉勰的文學觀乃是一種人生的哲學。

sentences.english: At its core, the American dream is childlike, too.
sentences.chinese: 歸根結底，美國夢就如同孩子一樣天真。

definition: whether or not (at the end of a phrase)

system/organization

no doubt/undoubtedly
